channel.title: New problem
channel.description:
Ok, im doing this the hard way, and theres got to be an easier way of doing it! Making straight lines! I need them to be as as straight as possible you see, but i just can't do it! Is there any tool which makes straight lines?
If so, please tell me!!
Thanks!
~Johno
(Soz for all these posts, need need to refresh/learn some new things)

item.title: New problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Straight lines? I don’t understand.
The line drawn between 2 points is as straight as you get.

But if you mean lines parallel to the axis then you have 2 choices.
(I assume your using metasequoia?)

  1. set the grid to snap to 1 unit (you should be doing this already, client only uses integer values, datmaker rounds to the nearest whole number to compensate for lack of IQ)
  2. use the align vertices tool.

Read full topic

item.title: New problem
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

You are meaning ‘View’ , I mean ‘Move’ .
In your command (thingy :P) you select ‘Move’

Read full topic

item.title: New problem
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Assassins Creed Fan:

The “Move” Tool.

What do you mean the “move” tool? I use that to pan around the view, i mean is there an actual tool that makes a perfect straight line, or is there anything you can do to make one?

Read full topic
